summary: A chronicle of the lives of a group of sisters growing up in nineteenth-century America.
cast: Katharine Hepburn|Joan Bennett|Paul Lukas|Edna May Oliver|Jean Parker|Frances Dee|Henry Stephenson|Douglass Montgomery|John Lodge|Spring Byington|Samuel S. Hinds|Mabel Colcord|Marion Ballou|Nydia Westman|Harry Beresford|Nina Borget|Francesca Braggiotti|Luke Cosgrave|Florence Enright|Harold Entwistle|June Filmer|Bonita Granville|Dorothy Gray|Robert 'Buzz' Henry|Virginia Howell|Olin Howland|Tony Kales|Marilyn Knowlden|Marina Koshetz|Lily Lodge|Charles Miller|Mary Wallace|Howard Wilson|Shorty Woods
keywords: coming of age|strong female lead|strong female character|female protagonist|year 1864
title: Las cuatro hermanitas
